mapper.select: SELECT combo.id, combo_name, combo_price, combo_introduction, combo_classification, combo_sort, combo_image.id AS comboimage_id, url, combo_image.name FROM combo LEFT JOIN combo_image ON combo_image.combo_id = combo.id ORDER BY combo_sort LIMIT ${(currentPageNo-1)*pageSize},${pageSize}
mapper.update: update combo set combo_name=#{comboName}, combo_price=#{comboPrice}, combo_introduction=#{comboIntroduction}, combo_classification=#{comboClassification}, combo_sort=#{comboSort} where id=#{id};
mapper.insert: insert into combo (combo_name, combo_price, combo_introduction, combo_classification, combo_sort) values(#{comboName}, #{comboPrice}, #{comboIntroduction}, #{comboClassification},#{comboSort});
